title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=79f0d698e4abf87f45628ddd3057be3fe4b83435
comments:
Hello, M 20 in urgent need of work (preferably
content writing)

My skills include effective communication, good proficiency in English, ability to co-operate with others and meet strict deadlines on time. I am a keen learner and constantly strive to improve myself and the way I can contribute to a project. I am a good writer and have worked on a lot of press releases and similar marketing work which has generated many sales in the past. What seperates my work from others is keen attention to detail and formatting so the viewer is drawn into learn more about a product or service.

I am currently a third year student and pursuing BA (hons) I am graduating this year and am ready to work fulltime/part-time (preferably work from home) at a moment's notice if we can agree on a figure.

Sample of my past gigs -

https://drive.google.com/file/d/15MVk8wlUtVUXay1PhGevXMyv_AibZ_sc/view?usp=drivesdk

I am located in Greater Noida so I prefer somewhere close however I am ready to work anywhere in NCR (if the job requires me to be in office)


You can contact me on reddit through a pm and further communication can be done through email.

Hello, looking to hear suggestions & get some guidance.   


29F, Sr. General Dentist, with 3 years of work experience as a medical data & quality analyst. Picked up a non-clinical role pre-pandemic and was forced to continue due to the fear around dental consultation and the spread of Covid-19.   
However, I quit my non-clinical role six-month ago to resume Dentistry but  I'm unhappy with the pay and working environment. Hence, looking to move back to non-clinical medical jobs.

Experience: 3 years  
Skills:  Analyzing and Interpreting complex healthcare data   
Location: Mumbai/Navi Mumbai or Remote  
Preferred way of contacting: Email ID/ phone no: once PMed
"relating to content writing", "lot press releases" (preposition of?). If you are saying you are proficient in english, at the least bother to proof-read what you post!
Lot of was just a typo what's wrong with "relating to"?
Ask just use grammarly lol. Humans end of the day.
hey, you need to make the drive link open to all. currently, i need to ask for access
Just a typo : And call yourself a professional? Wow!
